entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:03 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 03:56 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 3. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
